languages.text: Помимо несомненной компетентности благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, тому была и иная причина — свидетельства, указывающие на неблагонадежность окружения почтенного губернатора Вьятт.

traits.locale_text: Помимо несомненной компетентности благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорда-капитана, тому была и иная причина — свидетельства, указывающие на неблагонадежность окружения почтенного губернатора Вьятт.

languages.text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.
languages.original_text: Помимо несомненной компетентности благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана, тому была и иная причина — свидетельства, указывающие на неблагонадежность окружения почтенного губернатора Вьятт.

traits.locale_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.
Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.
Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.
Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

languages.text: 祝福受けしロード・キャプテンの有能さはさることながら、この決定には別の理由があった。それは ビャット総督の従者という信頼できる筋によってもたらされた、背信行為の証拠である。
languages.original_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

traits.locale_text: 祝福受けしロード・キャプテンの有能さはさることながら、この決定には別の理由があった。それは ビャット総督の従者という信頼できる筋によってもたらされた、背信行為の証拠である。

languages.text: 除了神皇保佑的舰长大人毋庸置疑的能力之外，舰长大人之所以做出这一决定，还有另一个原因：有证据表明，尊贵的维亚特总督的随从犯有谋逆行为。
languages.original_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

traits.locale_text: 除了神皇保佑的舰长大人毋庸置疑的能力之外，舰长大人之所以做出这一决定，还有另一个原因：有证据表明，尊贵的维亚特总督的随从犯有谋逆行为。

languages.text: Al margen de la incontestable competencia {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán}, existían motivos ulteriores para esta decisión: en concreto, pruebas de deslealtad en el séquito de la gobernadora Vyatt.
languages.original_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Al margen de la incontestable competencia {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán}, existían motivos ulteriores para esta decisión: en concreto, pruebas de deslealtad en el séquito de la gobernadora Vyatt.

languages.text: Neben der unzweifelhaften Kompetenz des gesegneten Lord Captain gab es einen weiteren Grund für diese Entscheidung, nämlich Beweise für mangelnde Loyalität im Gefolge der geschätzten Gouverneurin Vyatt.
languages.original_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Neben der unzweifelhaften Kompetenz des gesegneten Lord Captain gab es einen weiteren Grund für diese Entscheidung, nämlich Beweise für mangelnde Loyalität im Gefolge der geschätzten Gouverneurin Vyatt.

languages.text: Au-delà des compétences indéniables {mf|du vénéré seigneur-capitaine|de la vénérée seigneure-capitaine}, une autre raison motiva cette décision, à savoir la preuve d'une présence perfide au sein de l'entourage de l'honorable gouverneure Vyatt.
languages.original_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Au-delà des compétences indéniables {mf|du vénéré seigneur-capitaine|de la vénérée seigneure-capitaine}, une autre raison motiva cette décision, à savoir la preuve d'une présence perfide au sein de l'entourage de l'honorable gouverneure Vyatt.

languages.text: Yüce Lord Kaptan'ın mutlak yetkinliğinin yanında, bu kararın altında yatan başka bir gerekçe daha vardı. O da saygıdeğer Vali Vyatt'ın maiyetinde gerçekleşen bir hıyanetin ortaya çıkarılmasıydı.
languages.original_text: Beyond the undoubted competence of the blessed Lord Captain, there was another reason for this decision, namely, evidence of disloyalty within the estimable Governor Vyatt's retinue.

traits.locale_text: Yüce Lord Kaptan'ın mutlak yetkinliğinin yanında, bu kararın altında yatan başka bir gerekçe daha vardı. O da saygıdeğer Vali Vyatt'ın maiyetinde gerçekleşen bir hıyanetin ortaya çıkarılmasıydı.
